home.parrafo-info: Computer Engineering student focused on programming, data analysis, and machine learning. Passionate about creating innovative tech solutions and committed to continuous learning.

sobre-mi.title: About Me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I am a Computer Engineering student at Universidad Peruana Cayetano Heredia, currently in my 8th semester. I specialize in programming, data analysis, and machine learning.

I hold certifications in SCRUM, Business Intelligence, and AWS Cloud Foundations, which complement my technical training. My experience includes an internship in the Translational Research and Computational Biology Laboratory.

I am a creative, committed person with a strong capacity for teamwork. My passion for continuous learning and professional growth drives me to constantly seek new challenges.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.title-proyecto1: Real-Time Seat Detection and Counting in the UPCH Dining Hall using YOLO
proyectos.info-proyecto1: Development of a system to identify lunchtime availability using YOLOv9 and OpenCV.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: Development of a music recommendation system using machine learning techniques, implementing collaborative filtering and SVD with CUR in Python.
